english.segment1: As I walk along this road. I see your footsteps by my side. As I walk I start to go. Start to go, now I'm alive
english.segment2: All along the road. We see ourselves. All along the road
english.segment3: You lift us higher. Oh how I love to be with you. You're there for me and I'm there for you. Oh how I don't want to fall down. Jesus you are always round
english.segment4: All along the road. We see ourselves. All along the road. You lift us higher
